source_url: https://www.whitehouse.gov/articles/2025/06/president-trumps-policies-are-delivering-wins-across-america/
tags: articles
title: "President Trump\u2019s Policies Are Delivering Wins Across America"
---
 
Across the country, Americans are celebrating a surge of victories as
President Donald J. Trump’s bold America First agenda revitalizes
communities and restores American greatness.

**Here are just a few of those triumphs making front pages this week:**

<figure>
<img
src="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Detroit.jpg"
style="width:600px" decoding="async" data-fetchpriority="high"
sizes="(max-width: 3300px) 100vw, 3300px"
srcset="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Detroit.jpg 3300w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Detroit.jpg?resize=600,327 600w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Detroit.jpg?resize=768,419 768w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Detroit.jpg?resize=1200,655 1200w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Detroit.jpg?resize=1536,838 1536w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Detroit.jpg?resize=2048,1118 2048w"
width="3300" height="1801" />
<img
src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," />
</figure>

In Detroit, Michigan, *The Detroit News* celebrated the landmark
[announcement](https://news.gm.com/home.detail.html/Pages/news/us/en/2025/jun/0611-plants.html)
by General Motors that it will invest $4 billion in American
manufacturing as it shifts more vehicle production from Mexico to the
U.S. — including in Michigan. GM joins [a host of other
automakers](https://www.whitehouse.gov/articles/2025/05/made-in-the-usa-president-trumps-vision-is-revitalizing-american-industry/)
in expanding their U.S.-based production as President Trump aggressively
pursues his America First trade policies.

<figure>
<img
src="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Arizona.jpg"
style="width:600px" decoding="async"
sizes="(max-width: 3300px) 100vw, 3300px"
srcset="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Arizona.jpg 3300w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Arizona.jpg?resize=563,600 563w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Arizona.jpg?resize=768,818 768w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Arizona.jpg?resize=1127,1200 1127w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Arizona.jpg?resize=1442,1536 1442w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Arizona.jpg?resize=1923,2048 1923w"
width="3300" height="3515" />
<img
src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," />
</figure>

In Phoenix Arizona, the *Arizona Republic*
[heralded](https://www.whitehouse.gov/articles/2025/06/icymi-for-the-first-time-in-decades-the-us-mexico-border-is-silent/)
a historic milestone: “The border is secure” for the first time in
decades. Thanks to President Trump’s unwavering dedication to national
security, illegal border crossings have plummeted to near-zero levels as
the Trump Administration removes scores of dangerous criminal illegal
immigrants from our streets — finally restoring public safety.

<figure>
<img
src="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Ohio.jpg"
style="width:600px" decoding="async"
sizes="(max-width: 3189px) 100vw, 3189px"
srcset="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Ohio.jpg 3189w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Ohio.jpg?resize=467,600 467w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Ohio.jpg?resize=768,986 768w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Ohio.jpg?resize=934,1200 934w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Ohio.jpg?resize=1196,1536 1196w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Ohio.jpg?resize=1595,2048 1595w"
width="3189" height="4096" />
<img
src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," />
</figure>

In Hamilton, Ohio, the *Hamilton Journal-News* in highlighted gas prices
at their lowest June levels since 2021 — with similar stories playing
out across the country as President Trump unleashes American energy
production. After Americans saw the
[cheapest](https://www.whitehouse.gov/articles/2025/05/cheapest-memorial-day-weekend-gas-prices-in-years/)
Memorial Day weekend gas prices in years, the [nationwide
average](https://gasprices.aaa.com/) for regular gas remains
$0.33/gallon below where it was one year ago.

<figure>
<img
src="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Pennsylvania.jpg"
style="width:600px" decoding="async" loading="lazy"
sizes="auto, (max-width: 3114px) 100vw, 3114px"
srcset="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Pennsylvania.jpg 3114w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Pennsylvania.jpg?resize=600,385 600w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Pennsylvania.jpg?resize=768,493 768w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Pennsylvania.jpg?resize=1200,771 1200w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Pennsylvania.jpg?resize=1536,987 1536w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Pennsylvania.jpg?resize=2048,1315 2048w"
width="3114" height="2000" />
<img
src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," />
</figure>

In Lebanon, Pennsylvania, the *Lebanon Daily News* touted Amazon’s $20
billion
[investment](https://www.aboutamazon.com/news/aws/amazon-pennsylvania-investment-cloud-infrastructure-ai-innovation)
to expand its cloud computing infrastructure in the state — creating at
least 1,250 new high-skilled jobs. It’s another
[result](https://www.whitehouse.gov/investments/) of President Trump’s
relentless push to establish the U.S. as the global leader in artificial
intelligence and technological innovation.

<figure>
<img
src="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Boise-Idaho.jpg"
style="width:600px" decoding="async" loading="lazy"
sizes="auto, (max-width: 1824px) 100vw, 1824px"
srcset="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Boise-Idaho.jpg 1824w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Boise-Idaho.jpg?resize=564,600 564w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Boise-Idaho.jpg?resize=768,816 768w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Boise-Idaho.jpg?resize=1129,1200 1129w, https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Boise-Idaho.jpg?resize=1445,1536 1445w"
width="1824" height="1939" />
<img
src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," />
</figure>

In Boise, Idaho, the *Idaho Statesman* covered Micron Technology’s [$200
billion
investment](https://www.whitehouse.gov/articles/2025/06/micron-announces-massive-chips-investment-onshoring-production/)
in its U.S.-based manufacturing and production of advanced memory chips
— which includes $30 billion for the construction of a second chip
fabrication facility in the state as it onshores production of its
advanced DRAM technology from Taiwan for the first time.
